BroadcastTopicNetwork.name: BroadcastTopicNetwork
BroadcastTopicNetwork.description: Represents a link between a broadcast topic and the Experience Cloud network site for Service Cloud.

BroadcastTopicId.description: The BroadcastTopic ID that's linked to the Network.

Name.description: The name of the broadcast topic that's assigned to the network.

NetworkId.description: The Network ID that's linked to the BroadcastTopic..

BroadcastTopicNetwork.accessRules: To access this object with Service Cloud, enable Incident Management in Setup and Broadcast Site Banner in the Incident Management setup.
